overview: Roy Mathew (Prithviraj), a young architect who has spent his entire life abroad, finally arrives in Cochin with dreams of starting a life afresh. But he soon realises that the city that he gets to live in is radically different from the one that he had seen in his dreams.[2]  By coincidence his individuality is misundertood for a witness to a sensational crime involving top brass of industrialists and political class.
title: Arjunan Saakshi
